Description:
Stylishly Unique Brand New Luxury Townhouse
Brand new and generously proportioned, this stunningly finished single storey residence has all the accommodation and luxuries you are looking for. Simply put, it doesn't get better than this!
Set to impress, the architectural design focuses on high ceilings, natural light and luxury finishes throughout. A generous open plan kitchen, dining and living area opens out onto a covered timber deck creating a seamless flow of space to live, entertain and relax. The elegantly finished kitchen comprises timber style cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops, glass splashback and feature pendant lighting.
Also on offer are three spacious bedrooms. A massive master bedroom with his and hers built in robes and a private ensuite plus two additional robed bedrooms that share the main bathroom.
Want more? You got it! Gorgeous timber style flooring, LED downlights, reverse cycle air conditioner, European laundry, double carport and a low maintenance, private courtyard with a lovely northerly aspect.
On a block only two dwellings, no owner's corporation fee, and positioned quietly at the rear, a superb location is the final enticement of this premium package. Enjoy plenty of additional outdoor recreation space with Keeley Park just a short stroll away, walk to bus transport, Westall Primary School and Secondary College, Westall Train Station, Clayton Shopping Plaza, Clayton Aquatics And Health Club and so much more! Just a few minutes away, additional nearby amenities also include Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, Princes Highway and the Dingley Bypass.

Easy Living in Vibrant Location!
Light-filled apartment with a sophisticated urban attitude and easy city access, this contemporary, 2 bedroom residence is peacefully set in a quiet cul de sac location.
